FamilyLeisureAfricaSafaris.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1-2       Samburu Simba Lodge     Mid-range lodge bordering Samburu NR without fences   Day 1: Lunch & Dinner Included      Day 2: All Meals Included                   +4 Photos          +3 Photos          Day 1: Lunch & Dinner Included Day 2: All Meals Included     3       The Ark     Mid-range lodge inside Aberdare NP     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       4       Lanet Matfam Resort     Budget hotel less than 1hr drive from Lake Nakuru NP     All Meals Included                   +2 Photos                   All Meals Included       5       Dove Nest Lodge     Budget lodge near Lake Naivasha (Naivasha)     All Meals Included                   +2 Photos                   All Meals Included       6-7       Mara Ndovu Lodge     Mid-range lodge just outside Masai Mara NR     All Meals Included                   +4 Photos          +3 Photos              All Meals Included       8      End of tour(No accommodation)      Breakfast Included           Breakfast Included
FamilyLeisureAfricaSafaris.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees Some meals (As specified in the day-by-day section)
FamilyLeisureAfricaSafaris.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          Book your own international flights when using this operator help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
